sentences.sContent: Atthis juncture, I suggest we take a short break.
sentences.sCn: 此时此刻，我建议大家稍事休息。

sentences.sContent: The talks are at a critical juncture(= very important point ).

words.tran: 连接，接合；交叉点；接合点

trans.tranCn: 关键时刻， 危急关头； 结合处， 接合点
trans.tranOther: a particular point in an activity or period of time
